Description: Digital identification Supply chain monitoring Digital voting Blockchain ProcessTransaction requested1.Could be any digital transaction - Transaction sent to every computer (or node) in a decentralized network to be verified2.Verified transaction is added to a new block of data containing other recently verified transactions3.A secure code (hash) is calculated from the previous blocks of transaction data in the Blockchain4.The hash is added to the new block of verified transactions5.The block is added to the end of the blockchain, which is then updated to all nodes in the network security 6.Transaction is complete7.If any blocks are altered, its hash and all following hashes in the chain are automatically recalculated The altered chain will no longer match the chains stored by the rest of the network, and will be rejected
